name: ERS Display CO2 LoRa
description: A wireless LoRaWAN® sensor for indoor environments that measures CO2 levels, temperature, humidity, light and motion (PIR). The sensor is equipped with a display, which enables effortless access to real-time information at a glance. The 2.13″ e-paper display has configurable features via downlink, NFC, or custom order. Add your company logo, change to an inverted color scheme, or from Celsius to Fahrenheit.
author: Akenza AG
